1370: Laurens moved to St. Aechten straet.A.2 after marriage.
Got married to Verthwi at age 27 in 1370.

1374: Had a son with Verthwi, Hollander, at age 31.
1375: Lost son Kornillis when Kornillis was 0 years old.
